title: Epic: Restore working authentication (login, verify, reset)
description:
Production users must be able to: (1) sign in, (2) verify email, (3) reset password, (4) sign out, (5) stay signed-in reliably.

Audit findings: UI references missing auth API routes (/api/auth/logout, /api/auth/verify-email, /api/auth/resend-verification). /verify-email expects ?token= but Firebase action links use oobCode/mode. Server cookie currently stores a short-lived Firebase ID token but is treated like a 14-day session. Logout does not clear __session.

Outcome: define a single, coherent Firebase Auth strategy + implement end-to-end flows + add regression tests.

title: Epic: Server sessions (Firebase session cookies)
description: Replace current __session=ID_TOKEN pattern with Firebase Admin session cookies (createSessionCookie + verifySessionCookie). Ensure 14-day persistence actually works, and all server-side auth uses the same verifier.

title: Replace __session=idToken with session cookie
description: Current implementation sets __session to the Firebase ID token (JWT) and verifies it with verifyIdToken(); ID tokens expire ~1 hour, so users get kicked out even though cookie maxAge is 14 days. Implement Firebase Admin session cookies: createSessionCookie(idToken, expiresIn) in /api/auth/set-session and verifySessionCookie() everywhere server-side.
acceptance_criteria:
- /api/auth/set-session uses Firebase Admin createSessionCookie
- Server verifies via verifySessionCookie (not verifyIdToken)
- Session stays valid after 1h (no forced relogin)
- Cookie flags correct for prod (secure, httpOnly, sameSite)

title: Unify server auth helpers (single verifier)
description: There are two parallel server auth utilities: src/lib/auth.ts (API routes) and src/lib/firebase/admin-auth.ts (dashboard). Consolidate around a single session-cookie verifier (verifySessionCookie) and expose helpers like getSessionUser()/requireSessionUser() used everywhere.
acceptance_criteria: - One canonical server auth module\n- API routes + dashboard layouts call the same helper\n- Consistent error/redirect behavior

title: Implement /api/auth/logout (clear cookie + revoke)
description: UI calls POST /api/auth/logout but the route does not exist, so server-side __session is never cleared. Add logout endpoint that clears __session (and optionally revokes refresh tokens/session cookies) so logout is real.
acceptance_criteria:
- POST /api/auth/logout returns 200
- Response clears __session cookie (Max-Age=0)
- Dashboard redirects to /login after logout
- Optional: revoke tokens for the current uid

title: Update client login/logout to match server session model
description: After switching to session cookies, ensure client flows are consistent: login calls /api/auth/set-session and handles failures; logout always calls /api/auth/logout and clears local Firebase auth.
acceptance_criteria: - Login failure surfaces actionable error\n- Logout always clears both Firebase client state and __session\n- No dead links to missing endpoints

title: Epic: Email verification (action links + resend)
description: Make email verification unbreakable: support Firebase action links (mode=verifyEmail&oobCode=...), provide a working resend-verification path, and give users clear UX after signup/login. Prefer Firebase Admin generateEmailVerificationLink + Resend for deliverability, but keep compatibility with Firebase default templates.

title: Add /__/auth/action handler (verifyEmail/resetPassword router)
description: Firebase action links commonly land on /__/auth/action with query params (mode, oobCode, continueUrl). Our app currently has no handler for this. Add an in-app /__/auth/action page that routes modes to the correct UX (/verify-email, /reset-password, etc.) and shows friendly errors for unsupported modes.
acceptance_criteria: - Visiting /__/auth/action?mode=verifyEmail&oobCode=... routes to /verify-email\n- Visiting /__/auth/action?mode=resetPassword&oobCode=... routes to /reset-password\n- Unsupported/invalid links show actionable error

title: Fix /verify-email to use Firebase oobCode
description: Rewrite /verify-email to handle Firebase action links (mode=verifyEmail&oobCode=...) using applyActionCode(), removing the dead /api/auth/verify-email dependency.

title: Implement /api/auth/resend-verification (Resend + Firebase link)
description: UI posts to /api/auth/resend-verification but the route is missing. Implement endpoint that (a) does not leak user existence, (b) generates a Firebase verification link (Admin generateEmailVerificationLink) with correct continue URL, and (c) sends via Resend (src/lib/email.ts). Add basic rate limiting.
acceptance_criteria: - POST /api/auth/resend-verification returns 200 for existing/non-existing emails\n- Email contains working verification link\n- Rate limited to prevent abuse

title: Improve signup/login UX for unverified users
description: Make it obvious why login is blocked and how to fix it: after signup show 'check your email' state; on login error provide resend link that actually works; optionally surface 'verified'/'reset success' banners.

title: Epic: Password reset (email delivery + reset UX)
description: Fix end-to-end password reset: reliable email sending, action link routing to our app, robust /reset-password UX (expired/invalid/weak password cases), and instrumentation so failures are visible.

title: Implement /api/auth/forgot-password (Resend + reset link)
description: Move password reset email sending server-side so we control deliverability/logging. Add POST /api/auth/forgot-password that generates a Firebase reset link (Admin generatePasswordResetLink) with correct continue URL and sends via Resend. Do not leak whether the user exists.
acceptance_criteria: - POST /api/auth/forgot-password always returns success message\n- Existing users receive reset email with working link\n- Endpoint rate limited

title: Update /forgot-password page to call server API
description: Switch client-side /forgot-password from firebase/auth sendPasswordResetEmail() to calling our POST /api/auth/forgot-password so behavior is consistent and observable in production.

title: Harden /reset-password page for Firebase action links
description: Ensure /reset-password handles real Firebase action links: accepts oobCode from either direct link or via /__/auth/action redirect, shows clear expired/invalid messaging, and redirects to /login?reset=success on success.

title: Epic: Auth QA & monitoring
description: Add regression coverage for login/verify/reset/logout/session-persistence and add production monitoring/alerts for auth failures (set-session failures, invalid/expired session cookie, email send failures).

title: Add E2E coverage for login/logout + session persistence
description: Expand Playwright smoke suite to assert: login sets server session, dashboard loads, logout clears __session, and session persists across refresh (and >1h once session cookies are used).

title: Add E2E strategy for verify-email + password reset
description: Define and implement a safe test strategy to validate verify-email and reset-password flows (e.g., Firebase Auth emulator in CI, or test-only endpoints to generate action links when NEXT_PUBLIC_E2E_TEST_MODE=true).

title: Fix /api/health env validation for ADC/WIF
description: src/app/api/health/route.ts currently marks service unhealthy unless FIREBASE_CLIENT_EMAIL/FIREBASE_PRIVATE_KEY are set, but server code supports ADC/WIF. Update health check to detect either (explicit creds) OR (applicationDefault) so monitoring matches reality.

title: Fix ESLint scope (ignore vendored build artifacts)
description: npm run lint currently fails because ESLint traverses vendored/minified JS under vertex-agents/venv and other non-source folders. Update eslint config/ignores so lint targets only project source (src/, functions/src, tests/) and not third-party artifacts.

title: Remove legacy NextAuth drift (env/tests/docs)
description: NextAuth is no longer used for runtime auth, but stale artifacts remain and confuse troubleshooting: src/env.mjs still requires NEXTAUTH_* and DATABASE_URL, .env/.env.local include NEXTAUTH_*, and tests/e2e/smoke-test.ts checks next-auth.session-token. Remove/disable these leftovers and update docs so the repo is Firebase-auth-only.

title: Epic: v1.0.1 Production Stabilization
description:
Audit-driven stabilization work to make auth/login/reset reliable, restore CI/CD gates, and validate Dream Gym end-to-end.

Tracked using Beads: https://github.com/steveyegge/beads

title: Epic: Auth & Account Recovery
description: Make sign-in/session cookies/password reset resilient for real users (parents + kids).

title: Bug: Login works without email verification
description: Unverified emails must be able to login and reach dashboard; show a non-blocking banner prompting verification.

title: Bug: Password reset + verification links are reliable
description: Forgot password and resend verification must work even when Resend is not configured (fallback to Firebase email delivery), and links must target the correct website origin.

title: Task: Friendly auth error messages
description: Map Firebase Auth error codes to user-friendly messages on /login, /register, /forgot-password.

title: Task: Add /api/auth/whoami for session debugging
description: Add an authenticated endpoint that returns current session UID/email/emailVerified and cookie presence to speed up debugging login issues.

title: Task: On-demand account migration via password reset
description: If an email exists in Firestore but has no Firebase Auth user, create a Firebase Auth user with a random password and immediately send a password reset link (email ownership required).

title: Epic: QA + Regression Gates
description: Keep unit + smoke tests green and add real-world coverage for critical journeys.

title: Task: Smoke tests are safe and runnable in CI
description: Ensure CI runs a smoke subset (no real credentials) and skips real-world auth smoke unless SMOKE_TEST_EMAIL/PASSWORD provided.

title: Task: Nightly synthetic QA against staging
description: Run Playwright smoke suite nightly and on-demand against a configured base URL (SYNTHETIC_QA_BASE_URL) with secrets.

title: Task: Expand smoke coverage for Dream Gym onboarding
description: Add/extend Playwright smoke tests to cover Dream Gym onboarding + schedule + mental check-in flows (using seeded/staging account).

title: Task: Add E2E coverage for password reset
description: Add Playwright coverage for password reset and email verification flows (prefer Firebase emulator + inbox capture to avoid real email).

title: Epic: CI/CD + Cloud Deploy
description: GitHub Actions workflows that build, test, deploy to Cloud Run, and verify health.

title: Task: Reinstate strict build gates in CI
description: CI must fail on lint/type/build/unit failures; only security audit may be non-blocking.

title: Task: GitHub â†’ Cloud Run deploy pipeline
description: Deploy workflow builds/pushes Docker images and deploys to Cloud Run (staging on PR, production on main) using WIF and healthcheck verification.

title: Task: Deployment runbook + required secrets
description: Document required GitHub secrets (WIF_PROVIDER/WIF_SERVICE_ACCOUNT, Firebase Admin, Resend, Stripe) and required Cloud Run Secret Manager entries.

title: Task: Add rollback/canary deploy strategy
description: Add guidance and/or automation for rollback (previous image tag) and optional canary traffic split for Cloud Run deployments.

description: Ensure Dream Gym APIs/UI are production-safe and covered by smoke tests.

title: Epic: React Native App Development
description: Pivot from PWA to native mobile app using React Native/Expo. Build iOS and Android apps for App Store and Google Play Store distribution. Leverage existing Firebase backend, Firestore data model, and Vertex AI integration while providing native mobile UX with offline sync capabilities.

title: Project setup (Expo, React Navigation, Firebase)
description: Initialize React Native project with Expo, configure React Navigation for app routing, and integrate Firebase SDK (Auth, Firestore). Set up development environment with TypeScript, ESLint, and Prettier.

title: Offline sync implementation
description: Implement offline-first data sync using Firestore offline persistence. Handle queue management for pending writes, conflict resolution, and network state monitoring. Ensure seamless UX during connectivity changes.

title: App store preparation (icons, screenshots, metadata)
description: Prepare app store assets including app icons (iOS/Android), screenshots, preview videos, and store metadata. Write compelling descriptions, configure privacy policy, and prepare for App Store and Google Play submissions.

title: Authentication screens (Login, Register, Forgot Password)
description: Build authentication UI screens using React Native components. Implement Login, Register, and Forgot Password flows with Firebase Auth integration. Add form validation and error handling.

title: Dashboard/Home screen
description: Create main dashboard/home screen showing recent games, players, and quick actions. Implement navigation to other app sections. Add workspace context and user profile display.

title: Player management (Add/Edit/List athletes)
description: Build player management screens for adding, editing, and listing athletes. Include player profile views with stats, photo upload, and team assignment. Sync with Firestore /users/{userId}/players collection.

title: Game logging screen
description: Create game logging interface with stats input (goals, assists, minutes played, etc). Support opponent tracking, match date/time, and notes. Sync to Firestore /players/{playerId}/games collection.

title: Practice logging screen
description: Build practice session logging with drills, duration, attendance tracking, and coach notes. Support recurring practice schedules and performance tracking.

title: Private training logging screen
description: Implement private training session logging with specific drills, skill focus areas, duration, and improvement notes. Track individual player development outside team activities.

title: Analytics/Stats dashboard
description: Build analytics dashboard showing player statistics, trends, performance metrics, and visualizations. Include charts for goals, assists, playing time, and season comparisons. Leverage Vertex AI for insights.

title: Settings & Profile
description: Create settings screen for user profile management, workspace settings, notification preferences, and subscription/billing info. Support password changes and account deletion.

description: Target initial page load under 3 seconds on 3G

title: Epic: Synthetic QA Harness

title: Fix Playwright browser install in CI
description: Tests fail because Playwright browsers not installed. Need npx playwright install chromium in workflow.

title: Fix E2E test login redirect issue
description: Tests register user but login doesn't redirect to /dashboard. Debug with: npx playwright test --headed --debug to see visually. Use screenshot verification. Check: 1) Firebase signIn succeeds, 2) /api/auth/set-session works, 3) router.push fires. May need to use pre-seeded demo account instead of registering new users.
close_reason: Fixed registration and login - PR merged

title: Configure CI secrets for synthetic-qa.yml
description: Need FIREBASE_* secrets in GitHub Actions for seed script and tests to work.

title: Get smoke suite green locally
description: Smoke tests still failing - need to debug set-session empty body issue. Login redirect works in prod but E2E helper has issues.
notes: Cookie fix committed (8d13a791) - simplified set-session to use only response.cookies.set(). Awaiting CI verification. Previous issue was conflicting cookies() and response.cookies APIs.

title: Add screenshot verification to E2E tests
description: Use Playwright screenshot comparison for visual regression. Add expect(page).toHaveScreenshot() assertions. Configure in playwright.config.ts with snapshotDir.

title: Configure headless/headed modes
description: Add npm scripts for headed debugging: test:e2e:debug for --headed --debug mode. Ensure CI uses headless. Document in CLAUDE.md.

title: Use UI Visual Validator agent for screenshot analysis

title: Major: Production Stabilization (Auth + QA + CI)
description:
Umbrella epic to restore a working Hustle experience (login, reset password, stable sessions) and enforce it with real-world Playwright smoke tests + CI/CD.

Tracking is managed with Beads (https://github.com/steveyegge/beads).

Success criteria:
- Email/password login works reliably
- Forgot-password sends a reset email and user can sign in after reset
- Unverified users are guided to verification
- Dashboard access is protected by server session cookie
- GitHub Actions deploys to staging and runs smoke tests against the deployed URL
- No test credentials are hard-coded in the repo (use secrets)
notes: Re-opened: additional stabilization needed (workspace provisioning + Admin SDK server routes + billing/storage hardening).

title: Epic: Auto-provision user + workspace
description: Ensure Firebase-authenticated users always have required Firestore backing docs (/users/{uid}, /workspaces/{workspaceId}) so login cannot succeed then bounce back to /login. Uses Admin SDK server-side provisioning.\n\nBeads ref: https://github.com/steveyegge/beads
notes: Implemented server-side provisioning in src/lib/firebase/server-provisioning.ts and wired into src/lib/firebase/admin-auth.ts + src/lib/auth.ts.

title: Epic: Server API uses Admin SDK (players/games/dream gym)
description: Refactor Next.js API routes to use Firebase Admin SDK for Firestore access (no client SDK on server). Align payloads with current schemas and keep legacy compatibility where needed.\n\nBeads ref: https://github.com/steveyegge/beads
notes: Refactored core API routes (players, games, verify, dream gym) to Admin SDK + added admin-services/workspaces.ts; updated smoke test to create/delete athlete. See src/app/api/* and src/lib/firebase/admin-services/workspaces.ts.

title: Epic: Billing + workspace updates via Admin SDK
description: Eliminate remaining server routes that call Firestore client SDK for workspace writes/reads (e.g., billing webhook + checkout session). Standardize workspace mutations via admin-services/workspaces.ts and add CI coverage for Stripe webhook flows.\n\nBeads ref: https://github.com/steveyegge/beads

title: Epic: Player photo uploads (server-safe storage)
description: Fix player photo upload/delete flows to work from server routes using admin bucket access (avoid firebase/storage client SDK in API routes). Add an /api/players/upload-photo endpoint (or update clients) and cover with Playwright.\n\nBeads ref: https://github.com/steveyegge/beads

title: Epic: Re-enable typecheck/lint gates
description: Remove next.config.ts ignoreBuildErrors/ignoreDuringBuilds, fix TS drift so builds fail on real type errors, and ensure GitHub Actions runs lint + unit + smoke gates before deploy.\n\nBeads ref: https://github.com/steveyegge/beads
